effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.3 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 666,753.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Mug's Moxie Jug

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 883 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 883 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 367 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: G3T-00t
description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.

Key to the Immortal Hearth

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
